name: Uncle's Shop
description:
Inherit Uncle's Shop

Your uncle recently went away and left his shop to you. Order, grow and craft items and sell them for big profits!

Controls
  • Tab - Open/Close Inventory
  • E - Interact with items
  • E - Place items
  • X - Remove placed furniture
  • Escape - Pause menu
Known Bugs
  • Web Browser has performance issues, please play the downloadable!
  • When closing the pause menu with escape, the game is still paused, use the Continue button.
  • To change the price of an item you need to hold another item in your active hotbar slot.
  • Ghosts have colliders, feel free to go out of bounds!
  • If removing the preset table in the shop, it will not give back a proper object. You can still take the tables you placed yourself! 
Fixed Bugs

None so far :(
